===Noun===
{{zh-noun|mw=個|mw2=跟|mw3=把}}

# {{qualifier|literally}} any kind of [[long]] or [[short]] [[rod]] with a [[handle]]; a [[cane]]
# {{qualifier|by extension}} [[walking stick]]

====Synonyms====
* {{zh-l|拐棍}} (alternative forms: {{zh-l|柺棍}}, {{zh-l|枴棍}})
* {{zh-l|拐杖}} (alternative forms: {{zh-l|柺杖}}, {{zh-l|枴杖}})
* {{zh-l|青藜}} {{qualifier|archaic}}

====Usage notes====
* In Mandarin, {{zh-l|拐杖}} is the most commonly used term for [[walking stick]]. By contrast, {{zh-l|手杖|shǒuzhàng}}can be used to describe a [[cane]] that has other uses, such as hiking or scaring away wild snakes.
